page.title: 05A Day In Our School
page.content: School starts at 9.l5a.m. I come in a taxi at 9 o'clock and play in the playground until the bell goes. In my class when we come in we do 7 a day and diaries first. Then we go in to assembly. Afterwards we do sums and some english. Sometimes we watch television. On Tuesdays and Thursdays we have P.E. and on Friday afternoons we have team games. We have a playtime in the morning and finish for dinner at l2.l5p.m. After dinner we play outside until l.30p.m. Then we come inside and do some more work. Sometimes we do sewing or cooking or painting. We have lots of books to read and look things up in. Some groups can work on the computer. I like the computer best. At 3.45p.m. I go home in the taxi. Sometimes I go to play at Duncan's house.
